SEARCH

rapidSmith 1.0-SNAPSHOT API

Packages
Package
Description
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstream
 
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.bitstream
This package is used to represent a Xilinx FPGA bitstream file.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.bitstream.test
This package contains several test scripts and classes aimed at testing the functionality of the bitstream package.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.configuration
This package emulates an FPGA that can be configured with the Bitstream class and can also be read back to create bitstreams.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.configurationSpecification
This package specifies the bitstream details of the architectures supported and contains classes to automatically generate new part libraries.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.examples
This package contains several examples of how to use the bitstream tools contained in RapidSmith.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.bitstreamTools.examples.support
This package contains some supporting classes for the examples given in the bitstream tools in RapidSmith.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.constraints
 
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.design
The design package has all the classes necessary to represent XDL designs in RapidSmith.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.design.explorer
This package contains the main classes to run the Design Explorer tool in RapidSmith.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.design.helper
 
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.design.parser
The design.parser package is a parser for XDL and populates the classes found in the design package.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device
The device package represents all of the resources available on an FPGA device (part name, tiles, primitive sites and routing resources).
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device.browser
This package contains the main classes to run the Device Browser tool in RapidSmith.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device.helper
The device.helper package is a set of classes which are used for creating and populating the Device class and other classes in the device package.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.examples
The examples package is a set of classes which are examples to illustrate how to use RapidSmith.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.gui
The gui package contains classes that can aid in graphical tool development in RapidSmith.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.placer
The placer package will have a full design placer, but it is still under construction at the moment.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.primitiveDefs
The primitiveDefs package is a set of classes which describe and represent the primitive definitions found at the end of XDLRC report files.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.router
This package contains a basic router and structure to help users build routers of their own.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.tests
This package contains classes to help test and maintain RapidSmith.
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.timing
This package contains all classes relating to timing information produced by Xilinx Trace (trce).
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.util
The util package contains several classes aimed at helping RapidSmith users do a variety of operations such as install RapidSmith, convert files, and run certain Xilinx tools from within RapidSmith.
